title: First Cues & Alone Time
summary: Begin simple cues and short independence practice.

lessons.title: Sit
lessons.objective: Puppy learns to sit on cue.
steps: Hold treat to nose, lift slowly upward until puppy’s bottom touches ground.
supportGuidelines: If jumping: raise treat slower or lure beside nose.

lessons.title: Hand Touch
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to touch your hand with their nose.
steps: Hold open palm near nose; when puppy sniffs/touches, mark 'Yes!' and treat.
supportGuidelines: If hesitant: smear small scent (cheese) on palm.

lessons.title: Alone Time 1
steps: Place puppy with chew, step out briefly, return before whining.
supportGuidelines: If crying: shorten next session; reward calm moments.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never return mid-cry; wait for brief silence.

lessons.title: Sound Socialization
lessons.objective: Expose puppy to gentle everyday sounds.
steps: Play quiet household noises (doorbell, vacuum) at low volume.
lessons.safetyNotes: Stop if signs of fear appear.
